EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder - Please Join Joe Tucci and EMC Board
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi Team,
This is a reminder to please join us tomorrow as we host EMC CEO Joe Tucci, and the EMC Board for a Town Hall gathering at our Palo Alto, Deer Creek office.
If you are in the Bay Area, please join our live audience in Palo Alto at 9 A.M. pacific. The event will also be streamed live <https://sites.google.com/a/pivotal.io/inside-pivotal/employee-information/pivotal-town-hall> via Inside Pivotal (the replay will be available on Inside Pivotal after the event, for those who are with customers or otherwise cannot attend).
This is a rare opportunity to hear from Joe and the EMC Board, and engage with him and the Board directly in an informal dialogue. Bring your questions!
Event DetailsThursday, 6 November, 9 A.M. (pacific), Palo Alto, Deer Creek offices. Live webcast <https://sites.google.com/a/pivotal.io/inside-pivotal/employee-information/pivotal-town-hall> and audio available (audio details are in the calendar invitation)
Finally, if you havenâ€™t done so already, please do take a few minutes to complete the Pivotal Town Hall survey <http://info.pivotal.io/eA00RJ02000UIW0005eN00C> from our gathering last week. Your feedback is very important.
Thank you. Bill
